title: Your Bookmark Validator
description: Say goodbye to broken links. Upload your bookmark file, and we will automatically check the validity of all links and generate a clear report.
featuresDescription: We provide a powerful, easy-to-use, and secure service to help you effortlessly manage your growing bookmark collection.

features.title: Comprehensive Link Check
features.description: Automatically detect broken, timed-out, or redirected links to ensure your bookmark library is always valid.

features.title: Batch Upload Processing
features.description: Supports standard HTML bookmark files exported from browsers, processing thousands of links at once.

features.title: Security & Privacy
features.description: All processing is done securely on your device and our servers. We never store your bookmark data.

features.title: Multiple Export Options
features.description: Export scan results as XLSX or TXT files for easy backup, cleaning, or migration.

features.title: High-Speed Concurrent Checking
features.description: Uses optimized concurrent checking technology to complete detection tasks in the shortest possible time.

features.title: Detailed Status Reports
features.description: Provides detailed reports with HTTP status codes and error messages, making problematic links clear at a glance.

howItWorksTitle: Refresh Your Bookmarks in Three Simple Steps

steps.title: Upload File
steps.description: Export your bookmarks from your browser as an HTML file and upload it.

steps.title: Automatic Scan
steps.description: Our system will quickly check the validity of all your links.

steps.title: Download Report
steps.description: View the detailed results and export a clean list of your bookmarks.

uploader.patience: The more bookmarks, the longer it takes. Please be patient.
uploader.dragAndDrop: Drag & drop your bookmark file here, or click to select
uploader.fileHint: (Usually exported from your browser as an HTML file)
uploader.invalidFileTypeDesc: Please upload an HTML bookmark file.
uploader.couldNotReadFile: Could not read the selected file.

export.exportDescription: Choose your export format and which links to include.
